TopicTitle: Lets all congratulate the KASA program on their 1000th flight!

Articles.Content: Woohoo! This is my 1000th flight EVER. Hurray! Lets hope the mission turns out well.
Dat engine gimbal. Just like the real thing. Grats on your 1,000th flight. Curious; do you keep track of each launch you do?

do you keep track of each launch you do?

I started counting launches when I think .18 was released. When the KASA program was started.

I though I was running KASA, was I lied to all these years?

(Congrats!)
